comments: Local/ STD Roaming outgoing calls at 50p/min
Local Idea to Idea Calls @20p/min and Local Other Calls @30p/min
Local Idea to Idea Calls @10p/min and Local Other Calls @30p/min

Unlimited Local/STD calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.10/min for all Idea to Idea calls will be applicable -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
